SEARCH
Module com.example.project3
Package com.example.project3

Class Date

java.lang.Object
com.example.project3.Date
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Date>
public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>
Date class is used deal with the information provide by the users. Date class generate object for date information, provide information for a certain Date objects, and check Date object is a valid calendar date.
Author:
Sihua Zhou

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Date date)
      Override method to compare Date object.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Date>
      Parameters:
      date - A Date object for comparison.
      Returns:
      The result of the comparing between two Date objects, -1 for smaller in calendar, 1 for bigger in calendar, 0 for equal.

    • isValid

      Change the date in a Date object is a valid calendar date.
      Returns:

      Helper method that check a year is a leap year or not.

      Returns:
